title: Bug 9160Decorators: NULL handles in decorateImage and decorateText
description: I20020205The text and image handles for the ILabelProvider methods are now being passedas null. This means that when you turn on the CVS decorator, the labels in theresource names navigator dissapear. Instead all you see is " 1.5" the revisionnumbers. Also, why is the image being passed as null, it has always beenavailable.
